price: E Satã sussurrou-lhe perfídias. Disse: "Ó Adão! Queres que te indique a árvore da eternidade e um reino, que jamais perecerá?"
arabic: فَوَسۡوَسَ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ قَالَ يَٰٓـَٔادَمُ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ وَمُلۡكٖ لَّا يَبۡلَىٰ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fawaswasa ilayhi al-shayṭānu qāla yāādamu hal adulluka ʿalā shajarati al-khul'di wamul'kin lā yablā
